item.title: As Hurricane Milton intensifies, Florida could see its largest evacuation in years
item.description: Milton became a Category 3 storm early Monday and is expected to continue to strengthen before making landfall in Florida midweek. The state could see its largest evacuation orders since 2017.

item.title: How a year of Israel-Hamas war disrupted lives. And, key factors for Michigan voters

item.title: Vigils and protests mark 1 year since Hamas attacks on Israel as fighting rages on
item.description: Vigils are taking worldwide to commemorate the approximately 1,200 killed in the Hamas attacks a year ago. Protests are planned to demand a cease-fire to the war that has killed nearly 42,000 in Gaza.

item.title: One possible housing crisis solution? A new kind of public housing for all income levels
item.description: Maryland's Montgomery County is building mixed-income apartments in which people who can afford to pay market rate allow other renters to pay less. Cities and states nationwide are taking up the idea.
item.content:encoded:
Housing Opportunities Commission, adjusts Maryland State Delegate Lorig Charkoudian's hardhat during a groundbreaking ceremony for the Hillandale Gateway housing development in Silver Spring, Md. The HOC says it owns more than 9,400 apartment, townhome and single-family home rental properties and provides subsidized housing for more than 9,300 households.'/>
